con.para: Physics is the study of how things work in the universe! From tiny particles to massive planets, physics helps us understand the rules that everything follows.
Physics explains everyday things like how your bike moves, why the sky is blue, and even how electricity powers your devices!
Everything around you—from the movement of a car to how sound travels—is related to physics. You use it all the time without even knowing!
People like Isaac Newton and Albert Einstein discovered the rules of physics that help us understand the world today.
Physics has different parts! Some study how things move (mechanics), others study light and sound (optics and acoustics), and some look at electricity and magnets (electromagnetism).
Can you think of something you do every day that uses physics? Whether you throw a ball, ride a bike, or flip a light switch, physics is involved!

con.title: What You Will Learn in Physics

con.para: In this app, you'll learn about forces, energy, electricity, light, sound, and much more through fun experiments and activities!
Now that you know why physics is cool, let’s jump in and explore how everything works!
